original_text: Isaiah said, ‘The Lord will do what he has promised to do for you. This is how you will know that it will really happen.
korean_text: 이는 여호와께로 말미암는 너를 위한 징조이니 곧 여호와께서 하신 말씀을 그가 이루신다는 증거이니라

sentences.original_text: what he has promised to do for you
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너를 위해 행하기로 약속한 것을

sentences.original_text: This is how you will know
